scatter plot
```{r}
x = rnorm(100)

y = rnorm(100)

plot(x,y)

plot(x,y, xlab="this the X axis", ylab="this is the y axis", main="Ahmed Azab")
```
save graph of plot in pdf using pdf() or as jpeg by jpeg()

dev.off()   indicates to r that we are done creating the plot
```{r}
jpeg("Figure.jpeg")
plot(x,y, col='green')
dev.off()
```
seq like inrange in python 


```{r}
x = seq(1,10)

x
```
shorthand   seq()
```{r}
x = 1:10

x
```
